# Objection-Reply Lab Template ⚖️

Use this worksheet for deeper analysis once per week.

```text
Thinker/Text:
Argument in one sentence:

Objection 1:
- Why this objection matters:

Possible Reply 1:
- Is the reply strong enough? Why/why not:

Objection 2 (optional):
- Why this objection matters:

Possible Reply 2 (optional):
- Is the reply strong enough? Why/why not:

My current judgment (3 lines max):
What evidence could change my mind:
```

## Quick Scoring

- Clarity of argument: /5
- Strength of objection: /5
- Strength of reply: /5
- Overall confidence: /5
